quest.name: A Literary Delivery
journal:
 Quest Sync
Toffwyb seems excited to meet a real-life adventurer.

dialogue.name: TOFFWYB
dialogue.text: Are you... Are you one of those adventuring types I've heard so much about!? Oh, but this is perfect! I just happen to have an errand of the kind that adventurers love! Or so I'm told.

dialogue.name: TOFFWYB
dialogue.text: I'm holding on to some volumes my customers ordered in, but instead of coming to pick them up, they've all decided that they want their goods delivered. So, I find myself in need of a delivery drudge...er, person. Might that person be you!?

dialogue.name: TOFFWYB
dialogue.text: Huzzah! Let me give you the details, then. All in all, there are three books on the delivery docket.

dialogue.name: TOFFWYB
dialogue.text: The first, Ishgardian Astrology: A Comprehensive Theory, should be handed to the servant at Albright Manor. The White Yonder is for a certain talkative booklover who you'll know by the constant stream of chatter. And the last, Narrow Road through the Deep Grass, goes to one of the toughest, most unflappable gleaners I have ever met.

dialogue.name: TOFFWYB
dialogue.text: I'll just mark their locations on this handy map...like so. The books are bought and paid for─no need to collect any coin─but do return to me for your own reward!

dialogue.name: TOFFWYB
dialogue.text: If you just throw the books in the harbor, I will find out. Not that I think you would! ...I'm watching you.

dialogue.name: MAIDINSEVESTRE
dialogue.text: Welcome to Albright Manor! ...Do you have an appointment?

dialogue.name: MAIDINSEVESTRE
dialogue.text: Ah, yes, one copy of Ishgardian Astrology: A Comprehensive Theory, just as his lordship requested.

dialogue.name: MAIDINSEVESTRE
dialogue.text: I must confess to some confusion, however... What interest would his lordship, an esteemed practitioner of Sharlayan astrology, have in such an outdated Ishgardian discipline?

dialogue.name: MAIDINSEVESTRE
dialogue.text: ...Not that I am in any position to question his lordship's reading habits, of course. Ahem. On your way, then.

dialogue.name: CHATTYBIBLIOPHILIA
dialogue.text: Please tell me you've brought my new book! I've been waiting for what feels like ages for the latest shipment to arrive!

dialogue.name: CHATTYBIBLIOPHILIA
dialogue.text: Yes! Finally! Did you know The White Yonder was written by a lad of fourteen years? I myself questioned how reliable such a work could possibly be, but a Far Eastern colleague with whom I've been exchanging correspondence says he absolutely swears by it.

dialogue.name: CHATTYBIBLIOPHILIA
dialogue.text: It describes the wonders of the Abalathian Sea of Clouds in exquisite detail, and is, by all accounts, a roaring good read. The bit about the fighting paissas is said to be an especially entertaining episode.

dialogue.name: CHATTYBIBLIOPHILIA
dialogue.text: Well, I should let you return to your deliveries and whatnot. Thank you kindly for putting this long-awaited treat into my ever-so-grateful hands!

dialogue.name: FEARLESSGLEANER
dialogue.text: ...Something I can help you with?

dialogue.name: FEARLESSGLEANER
dialogue.text: Ah, is that my book? Good. I need it for my journey.

dialogue.name: FEARLESSGLEANER
dialogue.text: I usually don't have a great deal of time for reading, but as I'm leaving for Othard on requisition duty, I wanted to do some research on Far Eastern cultures. I know little of the peoples of the Azim Steppe...

dialogue.name: FEARLESSGLEANER
dialogue.text: Hm... It says here that “there are fifty-one distinct Xaela tribes, each with their own customs and traditions. The Buduga, for example, are exclusively male, and are known for kidnapping male outsiders to replenish lost numbers...”

dialogue.name: FEARLESSGLEANER
dialogue.text: Is...is this accurate!? I'll need to tread carefully, it seems. Thank you for the timely delivery.

dialogue.name: TOFFWYB
dialogue.text: All safely delivered? Hah! Of course they were!

dialogue.name: TOFFWYB
dialogue.text: My shop is well known for carrying publications not only from Sharlayan authors, but from all manner of foreign chroniclers and tale-tellers. Meaning every time a new shipment comes in, I'm faced with an avalanche of work.

dialogue.name: TOFFWYB
dialogue.text: I would've been buried alive without your assistance today, so here's a little something to show my gratitude. Go on, you've earned it!
